divs: sighting detailsi was outside at approx. 9pm sitting on the stoop with family and we noticed bright circular yellow\orange lights following each other in a line from the northwest to the southeast in the sky when the lights got to a certain part in the sky they began to appear smaller and smaller until they disappeared.
Summary: Bright circular yellow/orange lights flying in straight path in sky then disappearing
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Freeport
There were no other sightings in Freeport on or around August 10th 2013
This sighting has never been favorited.
